about_the_game: This game plunges players into a challenging dungeon world where they play as a brave skeleton, using the ASDW keys to move and the space bar to jump and attack. The game features a dark style design with strong color contrasts, creating a mysterious and tense atmosphere. The skeleton must navigate through a complex environment, overcoming obstacles above and below, which adds to the game's difficulty. Players must carefully avoid falling through gaps or colliding with other monsters, as either will result in a game over. With every step forward, players have the chance to earn different rewards, such as stars and fruits, which not only add to the fun but also offer assistance to the skeleton at critical moments. The game's sound effects are outstanding, from the skeleton's jumping sounds to the attack sounds and the special effects when obtaining rewards, greatly enhancing the immersive experience.

name: Fractious

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 11 x64
  • Processor: i5 3550 / FX-8350
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 660Ti 3GB / R9 270X 4GB
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
